item.title: Jogulamba temple priest Anand Sharma in trouble following Alampur MLA’s complaint to Speaker
item.description:
<![CDATA[Jogulamba temple priest Anand Sharma in trouble following Alampur MLA’s complaint to Speaker
In addition to filing a complaint with the II-Town Police, the Dalit MLA also submitted a complaint to Speaker G Prasad Kumar. Following this, the Speaker instructed the District Collector to investigate the motive behind the priest recording images and videos of the MLA and his family and to submit a report.
By Telangana Today Published Date - 27 February 2025, 10:55 AM
In addition to filing a compla...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
